If Gamepad Button Down: With this action you can poll a gamepad to see if a given button is currently being held down. The action will return true every step that the button is being held down, or false otherwise, although if you click the not modifier you can then check to see if the button is not being held, ie: the action will return true while no button is down and false if there is. If you only need to check for a single button press then use the action If Gamepad Button Pressed.
If the button being checked is an analogue button, then it will not be considered held down until the button value has gone above the threshold set using the action Set Gamepad Button Threshold.
